items.title: Do I need a Twitter account to use Twitter Viewer?
items.description: No. The X viewer works without logging in, so you can research, monitor and export data anonymously.

items.title: Is Twitter Viewer compliant with X rate limits?
items.description: Yes. We respect public API limits and rotate infrastructure so your browsing stays reliable.

items.title: Can Twitter Viewer monitor private accounts?
items.description: Twitter Viewer only surfaces public data. Private or protected accounts remain inaccessible.

items.title: How fresh is the data in the Twitter Viewer?
items.description: Profiles, hashtags and threads refresh every few minutes, with manual refresh available on demand.

items.title: Does Twitter Viewer support team workspaces?
items.description: Absolutely. Invite teammates, share saved views and manage permissions from a single workspace.
